x_58872_needit.MyScript = (function() {
	"use strict";

/* set your private variables and functions here. For example: 
	var privateVar = 0; 
	function private_function() {
		return ++privateVar;
	}
*/

/* Share variables between multiple UI scripts by adding them to your scope object. For example: 
	x_58872_needit.sharedVar = 0; 

 Then access them in your scripts the same way. For example: 
	function get_shared() {
		return x_58872_needit.sharedVar;
	}
*/

	return {

/* set your public API here. For example:
		incrementAndReturnPrivateVar: function() {
			return private_function();
		},
*/
		sayHello: function() {
			return 'Hello world';
		},

		type:  "MyScript"
	};
})();
]]></script><script_name>MyScript</script_name><sys_class_name>sys_ui_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-11 02:34:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>d8272a169306c210868ab4de3bba103e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>x_58872_needit.MyScript</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ui_script_d8272a169306c210868ab4de3bba103e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-11 02:34:42</sys_updated_on><ui_type>0</ui_type><use_scoped_format>true</use_scoped_format></sys_ui_script></record_update>
